# Heal, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Healing Spells|healing]])

**Level:** [[9th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 9]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 19th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 19]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Targets:** One or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 294

This spell functions like *[[Heal (Spell)|heal]]**,* except as noted above. The maximum number of hit points restored to each creature is 250.
